__e: Seems to me that once you have a good fire, sufficient food, and a good husband...
Don't-- don't they say that when you're in trouble, you just stay put wherever you are and wait till help comes?
It's what we say when we want something, when we need something, and you're as guilty of it as anybody.
I know, but my dad said that when you're looking, the first one you like is the one you should buy.
I alone have two hands, but when we are together there are four hands.
In a small town, in a small area, everybody is related, everybody is somehow connected, and I think when you're, you know, in law enforcement, it's harder, sometimes, to separate yourselves.

When we were together, I would've done anything for you.
Anyway, when we were together, you threatened to kill me a ton of times.
Yes, well, after being actually beaten, stabbed and shot, the lieutenant here showed he had blood in his lungs, which indicates he was still alive when he was thrown from the aircraft.
And if that's the last thing he remembers, then everything he's seeing now doesn't make much sense to him, just like it didn't to Elisabeth when we first found her.
'.. of a thing before you have it and of a human after you lose him.'
